Weight (kg).description: The weight of the individual in kilograms

Standing Height (cm).description: The standing height of the individual in centimeters

BMI(kg/m**2).description: The Body Mass Index of the individual calculated as weight in kilograms divided by height in meters squared

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health and fitness.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the weight and height of the individuals, please predict the BMI.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health and fitness.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the height and BMI of the individuals, please predict the weight.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted weight in kg is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health and fitness.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the weight and BMI of the individuals, please predict the standing height.
